content: The most common athletic games in the world are soccer, basketball, football, rugby, baseball, cricket, ice hockey, volleyball, beach volleyball, tennis, table tennis, golf, boxing, wrestling, badminton and bowling.
translations: ita:Gli sport più comuni del mondo sono﹕ calcio, basket, football, rugby, baseball, cricket, hockey su ghiaccio, pallavolo,
